title: Oyez, Oyez, Oyez!
description: The US Supreme Court is back in session and started a new term on Monday, October 2, 2017. Oyez.org begins the new term as well with free access to audio and transcripts of oral arguments before the Court. In its first week back, the Court will hear arguments in an important voting rights case coming out of Wisconsin, among other cases. Stop by and check out our partner site for detailed information on all the cases before the Court this term.
